uk.co.caprica.vlcj.component

Class DirectMediaPlayerComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.component.DirectMediaPlayerComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RenderCallback, VideoOutputEventListener, MediaPlayerEventListener

    public class DirectMediaPlayerComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements VideoOutputEventListener, MediaPlayerEventListener, RenderCallback
    Encapsulation of a direct-rendering media player.

    The default behaviour is to provide the video data via the display(Memory) method.

    Sub-classes may override this method to implement their own processing, or alternately return an implementation of a RenderCallback by overriding the onGetRenderCallback() template method.

    An example: mediaPlayerComponent = new DirectMediaPlayerComponent() { protected String[] onGetMediaPlayerFactoryArgs() { return new String[] {"--no-video-title-show", "--ffmpeg-hw"}; } public void videoOutputAvailable(MediaPlayer mediaPlayer, boolean videoOutput) { } public void error(MediaPlayer mediaPlayer) { } public void finished(MediaPlayer mediaPlayer) { } public void display(Memory nativeBuffer) { // Do something with the native video memory... } };
